黒白: (こくびゃく) - black and white; right and wrong
黒百合: (クロユリ) - black lily (Fritillaria camtschatcensis); Kamchatka lily; Kamchatka fritillary
黒皮: (クロカワ) - Indo-Pacific blue marlin (Makaira mazara)
黒盗賊鴎: (クロトウゾクカモメ) - parasitic jaeger; Arctic skua (Stercorarius parasiticus)
黒目: (くろめ) - pupil and (dark) iris of the eye; dark-eyed/sloe-eyed
黒眼: (くろめ) - pupil and (dark) iris of the eye; dark-eyed/sloe-eyed
黒眼鏡: (くろめがね) - sunglasses; shady glasses; dark glasses
黒石: (くろいし) - black stone; black (go pieces)
黒禿鷲: (クロハゲワシ) - cinereous vulture (Aegypius monachus); monk vulture; Eurasian black vulture; European black vulture
黒米: (こくまい) - unpolished rice/unmilled rice/brown rice; black rice
黒粕: (くろかす) - sake lees with black or brown specks (from oxidation enzymes produced by the yeast)
黒紋付き: (くろもんつき) - black crested garment
黒細大蜥蜴: (クロホソオオトカゲ) - black tree monitor (Varanus beccarii, species of monitor lizard from the Aru Islands of eastern Indonesia); Beccari's monitor
黒縁: (くろぶち) - black rim; black edge
黒縁目白: (クロヘリメジロ) - copper shark (Carcharhinus brachyurus, only member of Carcharhinus found mostly at temperate latitudes); bronze whaler; narrowtooth shark
黒縁目白鮫: (クロヘリメジロザメ) - copper shark (Carcharhinus brachyurus, only member of Carcharhinus found mostly at temperate latitudes); bronze whaler; narrowtooth shark
黒肉: (くろにく) - black sealing ink; black stamp pad
黒胆汁質: (こくたんじゅうしつ) - melancholic temperament
黒胡椒: (クロコショウ) - black pepper (Piper nigrum)
黒船: (くろふね) - black ships (i.e. Western ships, often painted with tar, that came to Japan in the 16th century); product, person, etc. arriving from the West and disturbing the Japanese market, etc.
黒色わい星: (こくしょくわいせい) - {astron} black dwarf
黒色人種: (こくしょくじんしゅ) - black race
黒色尉: (こくしきじょう) - Old Black Joe (a noh mask)
黒色火薬: (こくしょくかやく) - black powder; gunpowder
黒色炭素: (こくしょくたんそ) - black carbon
黒色癌: (こくしょくがん) - melanocarcinoma; melanotic carcinoma
黒色矮星: (こくしょくわいせい) - {astron} black dwarf
黒苺: (クロイチゴ) - Rubus mesogaeus (species of blackberry)
黒葦毛: (くろあしげ) - steel gray (horse coat color); steel grey
黒藻: (クロモ) - hydrilla (species of aquatic plant, Hydrilla verticillata); Papenfussiella kuromo (species of brown algae)
黒蜚蠊: (クロゴキブリ) - smoky brown cockroach (Periplaneta fuliginosa); smokybrown cockroach
黒蝶貝: (クロチョウガイ) - black-lip pearl oyster (Pinctada margaritifera)
黒蠅: (クロバエ) - blowfly (excluding bluebottles and greenbottles)
黒衣: (くろこ) - stage assistant dressed in black (in kabuki)/stagehand/prompter; behind-the-scenes supporter/string-puller
黒衣の宰相: (こくいのさいしょう) - Buddhist priest who is a government minister
黒豆の木: (クロマメノキ) - bog bilberry (Vaccinium uliginosum); northern bilberry
黒豆木: (クロマメノキ) - bog bilberry (Vaccinium uliginosum); northern bilberry
黒赤蝙蝠: (クロアカコウモリ) - Hodgson's bat (Myotis formosus); Bartel's myotis
黒足カコミスル: (クロアシカコミスル) - Central American cacomistle (Bassariscus sumichrasti)
黒足信天翁: (クロアシアホウドリ) - black-footed albatross (Diomedea nigripes)
黒足猫: (クロアシネコ) - black-footed cat (Felis nigripes)
黒身: (くろみ) - meat of a fish (e.g. tuna) that is dark red with blood, usu. coming from the parts close to the spine
黒酒: (くろき) - black sake (presented as an offering to the gods)
黒酢: (くろず) - black vinegar, usu. produced from unpolished rice; charred kelp or shiitake mushrooms ground and mixed with vinegar, used to dress raw fish and vegetables
黒金剛石: (くろこんごうせき) - black diamond; carbon; carbonado
黒鉄黐: (クロガネモチ) - kurogane holly (Ilex rotunda)
黒雀蜂: (クロスズメバチ) - Vespula flaviceps (species of yellowjacket)
黒雲: (こくうん) - dark clouds; black clouds
黒雲母: (くろうんも) - biotite; black or green mica
黒雷鳥: (クロライチョウ) - black grouse (Tetrao tetrix); blackcock (male black grouse); greyhen (female black grouse)
黒革: (くろかわ) - black-dyed leather; leather dyed in deep indigo; edible mushroom in the Thelephoraceae family
黒頸コブラ: (クロクビコブラ) - black-necked spitting cobra (Naja nigricollis)
黒風: (こくふう) - sky darkening dust storm
黒風白雨: (こくふうはくう) - sudden rain shower in a dust storm
黒駁: (くろぶち) - black spot; black speck
黒魔法: (くろまほう) - (ant: 白魔法) black magic
